posts.post_content: I gave him 5stars because the power to untap artifacts (like Steel Overseer and Everflowing Chalice )in an artifact deck is invaluable. He can tutor for an artifact in your deck AND play it! And finally when his ultimate, the body of all artifacts you control becomes 5/5 in addition to +1/+1 counters (try that with Pentavus).
posts.html:

Posted By: Davidian (1/17/2011 10:30:59 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@Nessin  
Hell yes. Use it to find Everflowing Chalice.  
  
This review is for the Tezzeret deck from Elspeth v. Tezzeret as a whole, b/c there is nowhere to rate this bombastically powerful preconstructed deck:  
Wow Wizards, just wow. I picked up the EvT duel deck a while back but hadn't played with them until this past weekend. The Tezzeret deck is just sick, it's a disgustingly powerful casual deck. The combination of [everflowing chalice](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=everflowing chalice) and [contagion clasp](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=contagion clasp) is just absurd, and with Tezz on the board it's really easy to proliferate twice per turn b/c that chalice is going to be over 4 counters in no time, essentially making the clasp's prolif effect free.  
  
This deck has so many amazing synergistic pieces for it to play with and the best part of it (worst for your opponent) is that it's all in blue so you can dig, dig, dig for everything:  
  
Diggers:  
[Trinket Mage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Trinket Mage)  
[Faerie Mechanist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Faerie Mechanist)  
[Runed Servitor/](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Runed Servitor/)... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:

Jace gets downrated for hate, Liliana for not appealing to a lot of playstyles.
